Corporate Domestic and International Recruitment Manager.With more than 51 programs across the U.S. and abroad, RI specializes in Crisis, Health, Recovery and Consulting Services.RI Crisis is rapidly expanding while enhancing technologies and service lines within our existing array of RRC's(Crisis Stabilization Programs), E&Ts (Involuntary & Court-ordered Treatment), and Crisis Respites.RI Health provides temporary and permanent housing, recovery education, and transition management. We're also adding clinical, medical, and routine primary care to strengthen our capabilities to support individuals at risk of suicide, co-occurring substance use disorder, and/or co-morbid medical conditions including diabetes, COPD and heart disease.RI Recovery has had a global impact on the mental health field serving as a demonstration that recovery from mental illness and/or addiction is possible. We have Wellness Cities in multiple locations in five states, providing individual/group peer support, fitness gyms, and education/socialization programs. We’re currently expanding our Peer Bridger/Navigator opportunities to ensure successful community transition of our participants (diverting from inpatient hospitalization and re-admission). Our programs emphasize recovery and cost-savings benefits.RI Consulting provides consulting and training services around the globe.  Subject Matter Experts from throughout the organization provide consultation regarding key programs including; Next-Gen Crisis, Transition Management, Integrated Outpatient and Peer Support, Suicide Prevention, Health and Wellness and Co-Occurring SUD.  RI Consulting’s Peer/Recovery Support Certification is the most transferrable in the world.  In addition to providing consulting and training in nearly every state, we’ve provided services throughout the United Kingdom (England, Scotland, Ireland, Wales) as well as Belgium, Brazil, Canada, New Zealand, The Netherlands, Norway, Singapore, and Tokyo.

HealthCare Select, is a personalized approach to Vendor Management Solutions (MSP) specific to the Healthcare industry. HealthCare Select specializes in contingent workforce solutions specific to the Healthcare industry. By using a collaborative approach we assist hospital administrators on determining which solutions are right for their organization. Through a network of leading healthcare professionals, consultants and software companies, HealthCare Select has partnered and benchmarked the best VMS trends, technology, and contingent labor solutions available in the marketplace.Our mission is “to be the leader in innovative healthcare workforce management solutions”. We develop this position by: * Creating solid and lasting partnerships with our clients * Delivering the highest quality services and advanced solutions * Committing to continuous process improvement * Providing an environment that empowers and motivates our people * Building alliances with key strategic partnersOur solution has proven results in our ability to:• Increase Efficiency• Reduce Cost• Reduce Risk• Enhance IntelligenceHealthCare Select focuses on Key Strategic Service offerings to include: • Strategic Supplier Managed Services (MSP)• Hybrid Clinical and Non Clinical Solution • Consulting Services • Credential Tracking • Payroll Services• Co-Employment Risk Mitigation & Consulting

Asurion has launched the Premier Support Solutions (PSS) business unit that nationally supports an array of clients in the tech, retail and wireless communications industries. This division is growing exponentially and will augment staffing levels from approximately 250 at the start of 2013, to well over 2,500 by the close of 2014. This means Asurion is in an aggressive start-up mode. We are launching six new operational facilities across North America and Canada.Premier Support Solutions is a service that complements Asurion's existing product portfolio to deliver a holistic way to protect your technology. Historically, Asurion's core business of handset protection pioneered mobile hardware replacement globally. Some of our more recent products focus on mobile content protection through cloud-data backup and security services. The newest addition to our product portfolio is protection of your technical experience. With as little effort as a simple call or click, a friendly and informed technician can provide assistance with setup, interactive guides and general troubleshooting support for most mobile devices. PSS allows the consumer to resolve problems with: an app or widget, setup and customization, device or OS malfunction, wireless data connection and most any other mobile-tech question.Specialities: Corporate Recruiting, Streamline Processes, Launched 6 Sites Domestically & Internationally, Delivering Hiring for Excellence Trainings, Onboarding & Orientations, Hiring, Offer Letters, Managing Internal Stakeholders, I9 & EVerify Management, Territories: AZ, TN, NV, Canada

HRN, is a leading Healthcare/Medical staffing service with offices in Phoenix/Scottsdale, AZ, Tucson, AZ, Las Vegas, NV and Reno, NV placing individuals into temporary, temporary-hire, and direct hire placements. In addition, I am solely responsible for management of the Scottsdale Corporate Branch. HRN works exclusively with medical offices, medical specialties, scientific, healthcare and healthcare-related facilities of all types and sizes with 26 years of experience!Specialities: Business Development, Internal & Contingent Performance Management, Staffing, Human Resources, Training, Onboarding & Orientation, Compliance, Credentialing, Payroll, Timekeeping & Reconciliations, Unemployment Claims & Appeals, Hiring & Terminations, Contract Management, Extended Human Resources Department for Healthcare Companies, Territories: AZ, NV

Life Sciences Division - Healthcare and Scientific placements into contract, contract-hire, and direct-hire positions nationally. Medix's Healthcare sector recruits experienced patient care professionals to hospitals, clinics, laboratories, pharmacies, long term care, chiropractic and dental facilities. Medix’s Life Science, Laboratory and Quality Assurance sector has experience recruiting in many industries, including food and beverage, pharmaceutical, biotechnology, medical device, oil and gas and environmental sciences. Within these industries, professionals  are placed in a variety of settings including QA/QC laboratories, research and development and regulatory.Specialities: Business Development, Contingent Performance Management, Staffing, Human Resources, Compliance, Credentialing, Timekeeping & Reconciliations, Hiring & Terminations, Territory: AZ

In my career I have had the pleasure of working with professionals who are passionate about what they do.  However, none have had the drive and dedication to be the absolute best like I have experienced from Cloey.  She is the utmost professional and regardless of the ten million things she has going on she makes me feel that at the time I am speaking with her that my concerns and our conversation is the only thing on her plate.  She is absolutely wonderful and a true pleasure to work with.  Thank you Cloey for all that you do.

Asurion is such a great company to work for. Their method of coaching is all around behaviors which impact the Customer Experience. There is no check list for QA which is a relief to see a company understand that behaviors are what drives performance. Asurion thrives on the basis of open team communication. This is not a company in which you are given a directive to follow. This is a company in which your feedback is valued and acted on. This is a company in which provides nothing up the best customer experience. This is a company that hires passionate people that are focused and engaged and motivated to succeed.
